caption.title: Competence development (transformation frequencya) in S. salivarius HSISS4 derivatives

fn.p: acalculated as the ratio of transformants (chloramphenicol-resistant CFU) to the total CFU count per 0.1 ug of linear DNA. Transformation frequencies are expressed as the arithemtic mean of three independent experiments. Geometric means ± standard deviations are provided. ND: not detected (<1.0 E-08), NA: not applicable.
